document.heading: Firearms Control Regulations Act of 1975 Amendments Act of 1983

history.narrative: Law 5-19, the “Firearms Control Regulations Act of 1975 Amendments Act of 1983,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-110, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 24, 1983 and June 7, 1983, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 9, 1983, it was assigned Act No. 5-36 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
